forum.name: Classroom Observation: Reviewing Numerator and Denominator
forum.intro:
In this activity, you will watch and discuss a video of an inquiry-based lesson in which adult learners are discussing fractions. This clip is a continuation of the video you viewed in Session 3.4.

  1. Watch the video below from PBS Learning Media. (You watched Part 1 of this video earlier in this module.)

      
    Used with permission: © KET 2012, All Rights Reserved.

  2. Share your thoughts in the discussion forum below. Click ADD DISCUSSION TOPIC to add a post to the forum. Respond to the following:
    • How does this discussion help learners to develop conceptual understanding of fractions?
    • What stood out to you about the interactions between the instructor and learners in this video?
  3. Read and respond to others’ postings. (Click “Discuss this topic” on an individual post, then click “Reply” to respond to that post.)
